enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve the creation and manipulation of collections, which can be used to set up the state for testing totalSize.
The put method modifies the state of the map by adding values, which can be used to set up the map for testing totalSize.
The size method returns the size of the collection for a specific key, which can be used to verify the correctness of the totalSize method by summing these sizes.
The values method returns a collection of all values in the map, which can be used to manually calculate the total size and compare it with the result of totalSize.
